# TrackEx - Remote Employee Monitoring Software

> TrackEx is a simple, privacy-first remote employee monitoring software for distributed teams. Track time, monitor app usage, capture screenshots, and measure productivity. Start FREE with 1 employee, then $5/seat/month for teams.

## Overview

TrackEx helps managers monitor remote employees without micromanaging. The platform provides real-time visibility into what applications team members use, automatic time tracking with idle detection, and optional screenshot capture for accountability.

### Key Features

- **Real-time App Monitoring**: See exactly which apps and websites employees use as they work
- **Automatic Time Tracking**: Clock-in/out with automatic idle detection (2-minute threshold)
- **Productivity Scoring**: Apps are categorized as productive, neutral, or unproductive
- **Screenshot Capture**: Optional periodic screenshots for accountability (Team plan)
- **Cross-Platform**: Native desktop agents for macOS and Windows
- **Team Analytics**: Compare productivity across team members and identify trends

### Pricing

- **Starter (Free)**: 1 employee, core features, no screenshots, 7-day data retention
- **Team ($5/seat/month)**: Unlimited employees, screenshots, 90-day retention, advanced reports
- **Enterprise (Custom)**: API access, custom integrations, dedicated support, SLA

Optional add-on: Automatic screenshots every 30 minutes (+$1.50/seat/month)

- [Remote Teams](https://trackex.app/solutions/remote-teams): Monitor distributed employees across time zones
- [Virtual Assistants](https://trackex.app/solutions/virtual-assistants): Verify billable hours and build trust with VAs
- [Agencies](https://trackex.app/solutions/agencies): Track contractors and prove hours to clients

### Solutions (By Company Size)

- [Freelancers](https://trackex.app/solutions/freelancers): Free for 1 employee - track your own time or first hire
- [Small Teams](https://trackex.app/solutions/small-teams): $5/seat/month for growing teams with screenshots
- [Enterprise](https://trackex.app/solutions/enterprise): Custom solutions with API access and dedicated support

## Technical Details

### Tech Stack

- **Frontend**: Next.js 14, React, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS
- **Backend**: Next.js API routes, Prisma ORM
- **Database**: PostgreSQL
- **Desktop Agents**: Tauri (Rust + WebView)
- **Hosting**: Self-hosted on dedicated server

### Privacy & Security

- TrackEx is NOT a keylogger - we never capture keystrokes or read content
- All data is encrypted in transit (TLS) and at rest
- Employees are notified when monitoring is active
- Employers must inform employees per applicable laws
- GDPR and CCPA compliant
- Data deletion available upon request

### Target Audience

- Remote team managers
- Small business owners with virtual assistants
- Agencies managing distributed teams
- Startups with remote-first culture
- Companies transitioning to remote work

### Target Keywords

remote employee monitoring, productivity tracking software, time tracking for remote teams, employee monitoring software, remote team management, app usage tracking, virtual assistant monitoring, remote work software, employee productivity software, work from home monitoring

## API Information

Enterprise customers can access our API for custom integrations. Contact sales@trackex.app for API documentation and access.
